original_text: For one will scarcely die for a righteous person—though perhaps for a good person one would dare even to die—
korean_text: 의인을 위하여 죽는 자가 쉽지 않고 선인을 위하여 용감히 죽는 자가 혹 있거니와

sentences.original_text: For one will scarcely die for a righteous person
sentences.korean_translation: 의로운 사람을 위해서는 거의 죽지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: though perhaps for a good person
one would dare even to die
sentences.korean_translation: 누군가 감히 죽기까지도 할 수도 있습니다
